00050 class BipartiteGraph {
00051     public:
00053 
00070         struct Neighbor {
00072             size_t iter;
00074             size_t node;
00076             size_t dual;
00077 
00079             Neighbor() {}
00081             Neighbor( size_t iter, size_t node, size_t dual ) : iter(iter), node(node), dual(dual) {}
00082 
00084             operator size_t () const { return node; }
00085         };
00086 
00088         typedef std::vector<Neighbor> Neighbors;
00089 
00091         typedef std::pair<size_t,size_t> Edge;
00092 
00093     private:
00095         std::vector<Neighbors> _nb1;
00096 
00098         std::vector<Neighbors> _nb2;
00099 
00101         struct levelType {
00102             std::vector<size_t> ind1;       // indices of nodes of type 1
00103             std::vector<size_t> ind2;       // indices of nodes of type 2
00104         };
00105 
00106     public:
00108         BipartiteGraph() : _nb1(), _nb2() {}
00109 
00111         BipartiteGraph( const BipartiteGraph & x ) : _nb1(x._nb1), _nb2(x._nb2) {}
00112 
00114         BipartiteGraph & operator=( const BipartiteGraph & x ) {
00115             if( this != &x ) {
00116                 _nb1 = x._nb1;
00117                 _nb2 = x._nb2;
00118             }
00119             return *this;
00120         }

00129         template<typename EdgeInputIterator>
00130         BipartiteGraph( size_t nr1, size_t nr2, EdgeInputIterator begin, EdgeInputIterator end ) : _nb1( nr1 ), _nb2( nr2 ) {
00131             construct( nr1, nr2, begin, end );
00132         }

00142         void construct( size_t nr1, size_t nr2, EdgeInputIterator begin, EdgeInputIterator end );

00145         const Neighbor & nb1( size_t i1, size_t _i2 ) const { 
00146 #ifdef DAI_DEBUG
00147             assert( i1 < _nb1.size() );
00148             assert( _i2 < _nb1[i1].size() );
00149 #endif
00150             return _nb1[i1][_i2]; 
00151         }
00153         Neighbor & nb1( size_t i1, size_t _i2 ) {
00154 #ifdef DAI_DEBUG
00155             assert( i1 < _nb1.size() );
00156             assert( _i2 < _nb1[i1].size() );
00157 #endif
00158             return _nb1[i1][_i2]; 
00159         }
00160 
00162         const Neighbor & nb2( size_t i2, size_t _i1 ) const { 
00163 #ifdef DAI_DEBUG
00164             assert( i2 < _nb2.size() );
00165             assert( _i1 < _nb2[i2].size() );
00166 #endif
00167             return _nb2[i2][_i1]; 
00168         }
00170         Neighbor & nb2( size_t i2, size_t _i1 ) { 
00171 #ifdef DAI_DEBUG
00172             assert( i2 < _nb2.size() );
00173             assert( _i1 < _nb2[i2].size() );
00174 #endif
00175             return _nb2[i2][_i1];

00180 #ifdef DAI_DEBUG
00181             assert( i1 < _nb1.size() );
00182 #endif
00183             return _nb1[i1]; 
00184         }
00186         Neighbors & nb1( size_t i1 ) {

00188             assert( i1 < _nb1.size() );
00189 #endif
00190             return _nb1[i1];

00195 #ifdef DAI_DEBUG
00196             assert( i2 < _nb2.size() );
00197 #endif
00198             return _nb2[i2];

00201         Neighbors & nb2( size_t i2 ) { 
00202 #ifdef DAI_DEBUG
00203             assert( i2 < _nb2.size() );
00204 #endif
00205             return _nb2[i2]; 
00206         }
00207 
00209         size_t nr1() const { return _nb1.size(); }
00211         size_t nr2() const { return _nb2.size(); }
00212         
00214         size_t nrEdges() const {
00215             size_t sum = 0;
00216             for( size_t i1 = 0; i1 < nr1(); i1++ )
00217                 sum += nb1(i1).size();
00218             return sum;
00219         }
00220         
00222         void add1() { _nb1.push_back( Neighbors() ); }
00223         
00225         void add2() { _nb2.push_back( Neighbors() ); }
00226 
00228 
00234         template <typename NodeInputIterator>
00235         void add1( NodeInputIterator begin, NodeInputIterator end, size_t sizeHint = 0 ) {
00236             Neighbors nbs1new;
00237             nbs1new.reserve( sizeHint );
00238             size_t iter = 0;
00239             for( NodeInputIterator it = begin; it != end; ++it ) {
00240                 assert( *it < nr2() );
00241                 Neighbor nb1new( iter, *it, nb2(*it).size() );
00242                 Neighbor nb2new( nb2(*it).size(), nr1(), iter++ );
00243                 nbs1new.push_back( nb1new );
00244                 nb2( *it ).push_back( nb2new );
00245             }
00246             _nb1.push_back( nbs1new );
00247         }
00248 
00250 
00256         template <typename NodeInputIterator>
00257         void add2( NodeInputIterator begin, NodeInputIterator end, size_t sizeHint = 0 ) {
00258             Neighbors nbs2new;
00259             nbs2new.reserve( sizeHint );
00260             size_t iter = 0;
00261             for( NodeInputIterator it = begin; it != end; ++it ) {
00262                 assert( *it < nr1() );
00263                 Neighbor nb2new( iter, *it, nb1(*it).size() );
00264                 Neighbor nb1new( nb1(*it).size(), nr2(), iter++ );
00265                 nbs2new.push_back( nb2new );
00266                 nb1( *it ).push_back( nb1new );
00267             }
00268             _nb2.push_back( nbs2new );
00269         }
00270 
00272         void erase1( size_t n1 );
00273 
00275         void erase2( size_t n2 );
00276 
00278 
00280         void addEdge( size_t n1, size_t n2, bool check = true ) {
00281             assert( n1 < nr1() );
00282             assert( n2 < nr2() );
00283             bool exists = false;
00284             if( check ) {
00285                 // Check whether the edge already exists
00286                 foreach( const Neighbor &nb2, nb1(n1) )
00287                     if( nb2 == n2 ) {
00288                         exists = true;
00289                         break;
00290                     }
00291             }
00292             if( !exists ) { // Add edge
00293                 Neighbor nb_1( _nb1[n1].size(), n2, _nb2[n2].size() );
00294                 Neighbor nb_2( nb_1.dual, n1, nb_1.iter );
00295                 _nb1[n1].push_back( nb_1 );
00296                 _nb2[n2].push_back( nb_2 );
00297             }
00298         }
00299 
00301 
00303         std::vector<size_t> delta1( size_t n1, bool include = false ) const;
00304 
00306 
00308         std::vector<size_t> delta2( size_t n2, bool include = false ) const;
00309 
00311         bool isConnected() const;
00312 
00314 
00317         bool isTree() const;
00318 
00320         void printDot( std::ostream& os ) const;
00321 
00322     private:
00324         void check() const;
00325 };

00327 
00328 template<typename EdgeInputIterator>
00329 void BipartiteGraph::construct( size_t nr1, size_t nr2, EdgeInputIterator begin, EdgeInputIterator end ) {
00330     _nb1.clear();
00331     _nb1.resize( nr1 );
00332     _nb2.clear();
00333     _nb2.resize( nr2 );
00334 
00335     for( EdgeInputIterator e = begin; e != end; e++ ) {
00336 #ifdef DAI_DEBUG
00337         addEdge( e->first, e->second, true );
00338 #else
00339         addEdge( e->first, e->second, false );
00340 #endif
00341     }
00342 }
